name: @commercetools-frontend/l10n
description: React bindings to load l10n data

scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js  -f cjs ./index.js --dir ./dist --chunkFileNames l10n-[name]-[hash].cjs.js --entryFileNames l10n-[name].cjs.js --experimentalCodeSplitting
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js  -f es ./index.js --dir ./dist --chunkFileNames l10n-[name]-[hash].es.js --entryFileNames l10n-[name].es.js --experimentalCodeSplitting
